author: jhutchinson
title: Italy 2 Albania 0: Fan trouble caused the game to be suspended for nine minutes, but goals from Daniele De Rossi and Ciro Immobile secured the three points
text:
EFL Fan fury Italy 2 Albania 0: Fan trouble caused the game to be suspended for nine minutes, but goals from Daniele De Rossi and Ciro Immobile secured the three points 
The home side scored in either half, but the match was marred after supporters threw flares and smoke bombs onto the pitch By Jake Lambourne 24th March 2017, 9:49 pm Updated: 25th March 2017, 12:26 am
